page.title: 16School Lessons
page.content: I come to school by running or walking. We have to wait for our {Caretaker}to open the door and then we go in and take off our shoes and put our indoor ones on so we don't get all the carpets muddy. We go into our class and get our reading books and sit on the carpet. My{teacher}calls the{register}and then she hears some people read. Then we go into{mathematics}or{language } groups with the other 3 classes. At l0.15 am. we go into{meeting}in the hall. Then it is{playtime.}Then at 11.00 am. wo go on working until dinnertime. In the afternoon (1.30 - 3.20 pm) we have{free choice sometimes. I like to build the Lego. On other days we work at our{Project, finding out, writing, painting, and modelling. Before we go home we tidy up and have a story or a poem.
